sources.title: Daredevils of the Red Circle
sources.description: Title: Daredevils of the Red Circle Summary: Using a diabolical disguise, Harry Crowel embarks on a vengeful career of destruction...opposed by three heroic daredevils. Directed by: John English, William Witney Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 10 June 1939 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Diabolical mastermind Harry Crowel, a.k.a. Prisoner 39013, escapes and, with a seemingly endless supply of henchmen, sets out to destroy all holdings of industrialist Horace Granville, who put him in prison. One target is an amusement park, home of the three Daredevils of the Red Circle, who perform death-defying stunts. Aghast at innocent lives lost, our three heroes swear to capture No. 39013. It'll be harder than they suspect; the villain is holding the real Granville captive, and with a near-perfect disguise, has taken his place!

sources.title: Daredevils of the Red Circle (1939) TV Serial Marathon All Chapters 1 - 12
sources.description:
An escaped criminal, known as Harry Crowl, but preferring to be called by his prison # 39-0-13, embarks on a vengeful career of destruction while he seeks revenge on the man who sent him to prison; millionaire philanthropist Horace Granville...opposed by three heroic daredevils.

Directors: John English, William Witney
Writers: Barry Shipman, Franklin Adreon
Stars: Charles Quigley, Bruce Bennett, David Sharpe, Carol Landis & Charles Middleton
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure, Crime
Budget: $126,118

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Chapter 1- The Monstrous Plot 
27:14 Chapter 2- The Mysterious Friend 
42:52 Chapter 3- The Executioner 
58:33 Chapter 4- Sabotage
1:14:07 Chapter 5- The Ray of Death 
1:29:43 Chapter 6- Thirty Seconds to Live 
1:45:18 Chapter 7- The Flooded Mine 
2:00:58 Chapter 8- S.O.S. 
2:16:38 Chapter 9- Ladder of Peril 
2:32:14 Chapter 10- The Infernal Machine 
2:47:43 Chapter 11- The Red Circle Speaks 
3:03:22 Chapter 12- Flight to Doom

sources.title: Daredevils of the Red Circle 1939 colorized serial feature
sources.description: Three heroic daredevils (Charles Quigley, Bruce Bennett, David Sharpe) work with the daughter (Carole Landis) of an industrialist (Miles Mander) being held captive by a diabolical mastermind (Charles Middleton) who escaped from prison determined to destroy all the projects of the man who put him there, and is now using a disguise to impersonate the man. featurized (2 hrs 45 min) version of the original 12-chapter cliffhanger serial I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: Diabolical mastermind Harry Crowel, a.k.a. Prisoner 39013, escapes and, with a seemingly endless supply of henchmen, sets out to destroy all holdings of industrialist Horace Granville, who put him in prison. One target is an amusement park, home of the three Daredevils of the Red Circle, who perform death-defying stunts. Aghast at innocent lives lost, our three heroes swear to capture No. 39013. It'll be harder than they suspect; the villain is holding the real Granville captive, and with a near-perfect disguise, has taken his place!
metadata.Writer: Barry Shipman, Franklin Adreon, Rex Taylor
metadata.Actors: Charles Quigley, Bruce Bennett, David Sharpe
